AddClientIdToOIDCProvider.title: AddClientIdToOIDCProvider
AddClientIdToOIDCProvider.summary: Adds a client ID to an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP).

AddFingerprintToOIDCProvider.title: AddFingerprintToOIDCProvider
AddFingerprintToOIDCProvider.summary: Adds a fingerprint to an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP).

AddUserToGroup.title: AddUserToGroup
AddUserToGroup.summary: Adds a RAM user to a RAM user group.

BindMFADevice.title: BindMFADevice
BindMFADevice.summary: Binds a multi-factor authentication (MFA) device to a RAM user.

ChangePassword.title: ChangePassword
ChangePassword.summary: Changes the password that is used to log on to the console for a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

CreateAccessKey.title: CreateAccessKey
CreateAccessKey.summary: Creates an AccessKey pair for an Alibaba Cloud account or a RAM user.

CreateLoginProfile.title: CreateLoginProfile
CreateLoginProfile.summary: Enables logon to the console for a RAM user.

CreateOIDCProvider.title: CreateOIDCProvider
CreateOIDCProvider.summary: Creates an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP) to configure a trust relationship between Alibaba Cloud and an external IdP. This topic provides an example on how to create an IdP named TestOIDCProvider to configure a trust relationship between the external IdP Okta and Alibaba Cloud.

CreateSAMLProvider.title: CreateSAMLProvider
CreateSAMLProvider.summary: Creates an identity provider (IdP) for role-based SSO.

DeleteAccessKey.title: DeleteAccessKey
DeleteAccessKey.summary: Deletes an AccessKey pair from an Alibaba Cloud account or a RAM user.

DeleteLoginProfile.title: DeleteLoginProfile
DeleteLoginProfile.summary: Disables logon to the console for a RAM user.

DeleteOIDCProvider.title: DeleteOIDCProvider
DeleteOIDCProvider.summary: Deletes an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP).

DeleteSAMLProvider.title: DeleteSAMLProvider
DeleteSAMLProvider.summary: Deletes an identity provider (IdP) for role-based SSO.

DisableVirtualMFA.title: DisableVirtualMFA
DisableVirtualMFA.summary: Unbinds and deletes an MFA device from a RAM user.

GetAccessKeyLastUsed.title: GetAccessKeyLastUsed
GetAccessKeyLastUsed.summary: Queries the time when an AccessKey pair was used for the last time.

GetAccountMFAInfo.title: GetAccountMFAInfo
GetAccountMFAInfo.summary: Queries a multi-factor authentication (MFA) device of an Alibaba Cloud account.

GetAccountSecurityPracticeReport.title: GetAccountSecurityPracticeReport
GetAccountSecurityPracticeReport.summary: Queries the security report for an Alibaba Cloud account.

GetAccountSummary.title: GetAccountSummary
GetAccountSummary.summary: Queries the overview information of an Alibaba Cloud account.

GetAppSecret.title: GetAppSecret
GetAppSecret.summary: Queries the details of an application secret.

GetApplication.title: GetApplication
GetApplication.summary: Queries the configuration information about an application.

GetCredentialReport.title: GetCredentialReport
GetCredentialReport.summary: Queries the user credential reports of an Alibaba Cloud account.

GetDefaultDomain.title: GetDefaultDomain
GetDefaultDomain.summary: Queries the default domain name of an Alibaba Cloud account.

GetGroup.title: GetGroup
GetGroup.summary: Queries the information about a Resource Access Management (RAM) user group.

GetLoginProfile.title: GetLoginProfile
GetLoginProfile.summary: Queries the console logon settings of a RAM user.

GetOIDCProvider.title: GetOIDCProvider
GetOIDCProvider.summary: Queries the information about an OIDC IdP.

GetPasswordPolicy.title: GetPasswordPolicy
GetPasswordPolicy.summary: Queries the details of the password policy for RAM users.

GetSAMLProvider.title: GetSAMLProvider
GetSAMLProvider.summary: Queries the information about an identity provider (IdP) for role-based single sign-on (SSO).

GetSecurityPreference.title: GetSecurityPreference
GetSecurityPreference.summary: Queries the security preferences for RAM users.

GetUser.title: GetUser
GetUser.summary: Queries the information about a RAM user.

GetUserMFAInfo.title: GetUserMFAInfo
GetUserMFAInfo.summary: Queries the information of the multi-factor authentication (MFA) device that is bound to a RAM user.

GetUserSsoSettings.title: GetUserSsoSettings
GetUserSsoSettings.summary: Queries information about identity providers (IdPs) for user-based single sign-on (SSO).

ListAccessKeys.title: ListAccessKeys
ListAccessKeys.summary: Queries the AccessKey pairs of an Alibaba Cloud account or a RAM user.

ListGroupsForUser.title: ListGroupsForUser
ListGroupsForUser.summary: Queries the RAM user groups to which a RAM user belongs.

ListSAMLProviders.title: ListSAMLProviders
ListSAMLProviders.summary: Queries identity providers (IdPs) for role-based SSO.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added resources.

ListUserBasicInfos.title: ListUserBasicInfos
ListUserBasicInfos.summary: Queries the basic information about all RAM users.

ListUsers.title: ListUsers
ListUsers.summary: Queries the details of all RAM users.

ListUsersForGroup.title: ListUsersForGroup
ListUsersForGroup.summary: Queries RAM users in a RAM user group.

RemoveClientIdFromOIDCProvider.title: RemoveClientIdFromOIDCProvider
RemoveClientIdFromOIDCProvider.summary: Removes a client ID from an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP).

RemoveFingerprintFromOIDCProvider.title: RemoveFingerprintFromOIDCProvider
RemoveFingerprintFromOIDCProvider.summary: Removes a fingerprint from an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP).

RemoveUserFromGroup.title: RemoveUserFromGroup
RemoveUserFromGroup.summary: Removes a RAM user from a RAM user group.

SetPasswordPolicy.title: SetPasswordPolicy
SetPasswordPolicy.summary: Configures the password policy for RAM users.

SetSecurityPreference.title: SetSecurityPreference
SetSecurityPreference.summary: Configures security preferences for a RAM user.

SetUserSsoSettings.title: SetUserSsoSettings
SetUserSsoSettings.summary: Configures information about identity providers (IdPs) for user-based single sign-on (SSO).

UnbindMFADevice.title: UnbindMFADevice
UnbindMFADevice.summary: Unbinds a multi-factor authentication (MFA) device from a RAM user.

UpdateAccessKey.title: UpdateAccessKey
UpdateAccessKey.summary: Modifies the status of an AccessKey pair for an Alibaba Cloud account or a RAM user.

UpdateGroup.title: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.summary: Modifies the information of a RAM user group.

UpdateLoginProfile.title: UpdateLoginProfile
UpdateLoginProfile.summary: Modifies the logon information of a RAM user.

UpdateOIDCProvider.title: UpdateOIDCProvider
UpdateOIDCProvider.summary: Modifies the description and client IDs of an OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider (IdP).

UpdateSAMLProvider.title: UpdateSAMLProvider
UpdateSAMLProvider.summary: Modifies information about an identity provider (IdP) for role-based SSO.

UpdateUser.title: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.summary: Modifies the information about a RAM user.
